smart-contract which distribute some mine coins by FPTCoin balance. ","methods":{"addMinerBalance(address,uint256)":{"details":"give amount buying reward to account, only manager contract can modify database.","params":{"account":"user's account","amount":"the buying shared amount"}},"addWhiteList(address)":{"details":"Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.","params":{"addAddress":"new eligible address."}},"burnMinerCoin(address,uint256)":{"details":"Burn mineCoin to account when account redeem collateral to collateral pool, only manager contract can modify database.","params":{"account":"user's account","amount":"the mine shared amount"}},"getBuyingMineInfo(address)":{"details":"Get the reward for buying options.","params":{"mineCoin":"mineCoin address"}},"getBuyingMineInfoAll()":{"details":"Get the all rewards for buying options."},"getManager()":{"details":"get manager address.      "},"getMineInfo(address)":{"details":"retrieve minecoin distributed informations.","params":{"mineCoin":"mineCoin address"},"return":"distributed amount and distributed time interval."},"getMinerBalance(address,address)":{"details":"retrieve user's mine balance.","params":{"account":"user's account","mineCoin":"mineCoin address"}},"getTotalMined(address)":{"details":"retrieve total distributed mine coins.","params":{"mineCoin":"mineCoin address"}},"getWhiteList()":{"details":"Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist."},"isEligibleAddress(address)":{"details":"Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.","params":{"tmpAddress":"input address for testing."}},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"mintMinerCoin(address,uint256)":{"details":"mint mineCoin to account when account add collateral to collateral pool, only manager contract can modify database.","params":{"account":"user's account","amount":"the mine shared amount"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"redeemMinerCoin(address,uint256)":{"details":"user redeem mine rewards.","params":{"amount":"redeem amount.","mineCoin":"mine coin address"}},"redeemOut(address,uint256)":{"details":"foundation redeem out mine coins.","params":{"amount":"redeem amount.","mineCoin":"mineCoin address"}},"removeWhiteList(address)":{"details":"Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.","params":{"removeAddress":"revoked address."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. devdoc.details: A smart-contract which distribute some mine coins by FPTCoin balance.

addMinerBalance(address,uint256).details: give amount buying reward to account, only manager contract can modify database.

addWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.

burnMinerCoin(address,uint256).details: Burn mineCoin to account when account redeem collateral to collateral pool, only manager contract can modify database.

getBuyingMineInfo(address).details: Get the reward for buying options.

getBuyingMineInfoAll().details: Get the all rewards for buying options.

getMineInfo(address).return: distributed amount and distributed time interval.

getWhiteList().details: Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist.

isEligibleAddress(address).details: Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

mintMinerCoin(address,uint256).details: mint mineCoin to account when account add collateral to collateral pool, only manager contract can modify database.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBuyingMineInfo(address,uint256).details: Set the reward for buying options.

setMineAmount(address,uint256).details: changer mine coin distributed amount , only foundation owner can modify database.

setMineCoinInfo(address,uint256,uint256).details: Set mineCoin mine info, only foundation owner can invoked.

setMineInterval(address,uint256).details: changer mine coin distributed time interval , only foundation owner can modify database.

transferMinerCoin(address,address,uint25.details: transfer mineCoin to recieptor when account transfer amount FPTCoin to recieptor, only manager contract can modify database.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: FPTCoin mine pool, which manager contract is FPTCoin.

setHalt(bool).notice: function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or not.
